title: Medical Camp 2024
description: conducted a successful medical camp at Govt Boys and Girls Degree School, Chanesar Village, partnering with IFM-JSMU, PSIG, and House of Dawah.

title: Heat Relief Camp at JPMC
description: Set up a heat relief camp outside the emergency ward at JPMC to help people cope with the heatwave while also spreading awareness about heat strokes, their management, and prevention.

title: Heat Relief Camp at Cantt Railway Station
description: Collaborated with VFAHT-ZU, Sadqat Ul Asdiqa, and MS4CA in supporting the local community during the heatwave with the Heat Relief Camp at Cantt Railway Station.

title: Vaccine Awareness Session
description: Visited 40 different classrooms at Govt. Boys and Girls Degree School, Chanesar Village, to educate students and teachers on the critical importance of vaccinations.

title: Water Cooler Installation at NICVD
description: successfully installed a water cooler in the waiting area outside the cardiac emergency department, NICVD, by a generous donation from a student and his family, who wanted to honor their late grandmother's memory.

title: Breast Cancer Awareness Session
description: PHH celebrated Pinktober with IFM-JSMU and Pink Ribbon by educating school and college girls about breast cancer and self-examination at Govt. Boys and Girls Degree School, Chanesar Village.

title: Annual Beach Fundraiser Event
description: Organized a fun fundraiser trip for university students to the beach and included activities like sports, art therapy, and delicious food.

title: Choti Eid Ki Bari Khushiyan
description: Team PHH celebrates Eid ul Fitr with the little warriors at NICH every year by presenting them with Eid cards, applying henna, and distributing snack and gift bags.

title: Children's Day Walk
description: PHH was invited to the World Children's Day Awareness Walk 2024, held at Sea View, Karachi, organized by Mir Tariq Ali Talpur, Minister of Social Welfare.

title: Hepatitis Awareness Camp
description: For World Hepatitis Day 2024, we collaborated with VFAHT-JSMU and VFAHT-BMU to conduct a successful Hepatitis Awareness Camp for the general public at JPMC, Karachi.

title: Blood Donation Drive
description: Together with Nixor Hospital, we conducted a blood donation drive at Nixor College, and the blood donated will be sent to the JPMC blood bank, helping to replenish their stocks and save countless lives.

title: Ramadan Campaign 2025
description: comprised of 3 major initiatives: Donation Drive, Donor Outreach, and University Collections—raised over 1 million rupees, directly impacting countless lives and truly embodying the essence of Ramadan.

title: Azadi Kay Rang Bachon Kay Sang
description: We celebrate our nation's independence with the little warriors at NICH every year by distributing gift bags, face painting, cake cutting, games, and photography sessions.

title: Nixor Hospital Collaboration
description: Team Nixor Hospital and PHH came together to support the initiative of NH Clinic in providing medical care to the community.

title: Collaboration with MY BIGGEST WISH
description: The German NGO, mybiggestwish, took a tour of our wards and donated a significant amount of medicines to our drug bank at JPMC.

title: Hypertension Awareness and BP Monitoring Camp
description: Team PHH hosted a two-day camp at JPMC Surgical Complex for “May Measurement Month,” an annual global campaign initiated by the International Society of Hypertension.

title: PHHxSIEHS Workshop
description: Collaborated with SIEHS to host a comprehensive Basic Life Support (BLS) Workshop and helped enlighten 83 trainees on essential life-saving skills.

title: Independence Day Celebrations at Sirat ul Jannah
description: We gathered to celebrate freedom alongside the bright young souls at Sirat ul Jannah, which was made possible thanks to our generous sponsor, Pakistan Petroleum Limited.

title: PHHxRESQ Workshop
description: on World First Aid Day, we collaborated with team RESQ to conduct a Basic Life Support (BLS) workshop for the PHH Executive Council.

title: Collaboration with LNH to distribute medicines in JPMC
description: We received a huge bulk of medicines from LNH Helping Hands, which helped us provide much-needed medical care to those who need it most.

title: Seminar on HPV Vaccine & Cervical Cancer Prevention
description: Team PHH was invited to the advocacy seminar organized by EPI-Sindh, UNICEF, WHO, and Jhpiego at the PC Hotel, Karachi.
